column1:
Coronavirus has now been confirmed in almost 10 countries. It is airborne and has no known cure yet.

Our most advanced healthcare system should all be focused on our international airports and borders.

And please handcuff Buhari to a table in Aso Rock so he doesn't travel.

That moment when the globalist #fakenews media used Kim Jong Un to push their global warming aka climate change aka #climateemergency agenda. 
What next, blaming #coronavirus on AGW?
